channel.title: How do i add ::update commands on my rsps? with a time. 30..29..28.. etc
channel.description: plz im usiong erasedpkz. base. and source its btkscape ... plz tell me how .. im bored to close my runner and rerunn my runner everytime that i want to make an update.

item.title: How do i add ::update commands on my rsps? with a time. 30..29..28.. etc
item.dc:creator: @voetbal645 voetbal645
item.description:
@voetbal645 wrote:

add this in commands.java

if (playerCommand.startsWith("update") && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURE NAME"))) { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); int a = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = a; PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }
then declare this in playerhandler.java

public static boolean updateAnnounced; public static boolean updateRunning; public static int updateSeconds; public static long updateStartTime; private boolean kickAllPlayers = false;

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add ::update commands on my rsps? with a time. 30..29..28.. etc
